title: VR Body in Bp (Local)
description: This Pack will add VR body to the VR template
longDescription:
Full VR Body Blueprint Pack with Control Rig Compatibility for UE5



Demo: https://youtu.be/X_gC8aMf7hQ

Documentation: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/c4d3lgev7msckde0ou6qc/VRBodyInBlueprint-Documentation.pdf?rlkey=tooxmpirwphh6hrtsgo45rped&dl=1

Discord:

https://discord.gg/ntRmYwjdBw


Overview:

Introducing a complete VR body solution made for Unreal Engine developers. Whether you're venturing into the immersive world of virtual reality or looking to enhance your current projects, this pack is designed with versatility and usability in mind. From a full-body avatar to just the upper body, this blueprint offers flexibility to meet your VR needs.

Features:

Full VR Body Blueprint:

Dive deep into the realm of VR with a full-body avatar. Designed with attention to detail, the blueprint offers realistic body movements and interactions in the virtual environment.



UE5 Skeleton Compatibility with Control Rig:

Built on the revolutionary UE5 control rig, the animation blueprint use Control Rig, enabling developers to create complex and realistic animations without any hitches.


Easy Meta Human Implementation:

Embrace the future of digital humans! With easy MetaHuman implementation, you can create hyper-realistic characters, enhancing the immersion and realism of your VR environments.

Tutorial in creation


Retarget to UE4 Skeleton:


If you need to use the ue4 skeleton, there is a function to retarget the ue5 body to ue4 body (upper body and not using hand mesh is not compatible)

Tutorial in creation


Toggle between Full and Upper Body:

Depending on your project requirements, you can effortlessly switch between a full-body avatar or just the upper torso. This versatility ensures that your VR experiences remain diverse and engaging.


Integration with VR Template:

To make your VR development journey even smoother, this pack seamlessly adds a VR body to the default VR template. No more tedious hours spent on integration; we've done the heavy lifting for you!


Why Choose Our Pack?

  • User-Friendly: Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting out, this pack is designed to be intuitive and easy to implement.
  • Highly Customizable: Adapt the blueprint to fit the unique requirements of your projects.
  • Regular Updates: We're committed to keeping the pack updated, ensuring compatibility with future Unreal Engine releases and incorporating user feedback.


Usage:

Perfect for VR games, simulations, training modules, and interactive experiences. Elevate your VR projects with lifelike avatars and seamless integration.


Actually Not replicated

Features to come

  • VR Movement system (Jump and thumbstick locomotion)
  • Allow stretching is not compatible to metahuman anymore since they update something in skinweight
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Teleport Movement
  • Full VRBODY
  • UE4 Retarget
  • Upper Body
  •  Bonus: Finger system on full body
  •  Meta Human example (follow tutorial)
  • Require OpenXR Plugin enabled

Number of Blueprints: 2 (Vr body blueprint and Animation blueprint)

Input: (using enhanced input system))

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes) (waiting for vision pro)

Important/Additional Notes:


Fully work on UE5 skeleton, UE4 retarget may have some problem

Not replicated

Meta Human compatible

Known issue, hand wrist are deformed when you set use hand mesh to true
